overview: The 'More Information' page of the Digital Experience Healthcare site provides a searchable and filterable interface for exploring healthcare services. It includes navigation, search, filter chips, sorting, and dynamically loaded service cards with accessibility and analytics considerations.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
Hero section with title and subtitle
Service cards grid with skeleton loaders
interactions: Clicking navigation links to switch pages
Toggling dark mode via theme toggle button
Typing in search input to filter services
Clicking filter chips to apply or remove filters
Selecting sort options to reorder results
Dynamic update of results count and service cards
data_flow: User input in search field filters displayed services
Filter chip clicks modify active filter state
Sort dropdown changes ordering of displayed services
Results count updates dynamically based on filters
Skeleton loaders shown before service data loads
accessibility: ARIA roles for navigation, group, and status regions
Visually hidden labels for search input
aria-live region for dynamic results updates
aria-labels on interactive elements like theme toggle and sort dropdown
analytics: Track search input usage and query terms
Track filter chip selections and deselections
test_ideas: Verify skip link focuses main content when activated
Validate theme toggle switches visual mode and persists state
Ensure search input filters results dynamically and updates count
Confirm filter chips toggle active state and filter results correctly
Check sort dropdown reorders results as expected
Validate skeleton loaders appear before data load and disappear after
Verify ARIA attributes and live region updates for accessibility
Confirm analytics events fire on key interactions
